TRADERWAGONS_SPAWN_CHANCE.name: traderwagons_spawn_chance
TRADERWAGONS_SPAWN_CHANCE.comment: Defines the spawnchance of a specific trader structure type. (default: 0.05)

RARE_STEAMPUNKSTYLE_TRADERS_SPAWN_CHANCE.name: rare_steampunkstyle_traders_spawn_chance
RARE_STEAMPUNKSTYLE_TRADERS_SPAWN_CHANCE.comment: Defines the spawnchance of a specific trader structure type. (default: 0.01)

METAL_TRADERWAGONS_SPAWN_CHANCE.name: metal_traderwagons_spawn_chance
METAL_TRADERWAGONS_SPAWN_CHANCE.comment: Defines the spawnchance of a specific trader structure type. (default: 0.2)

COLDCLIMATE_TRADERS_SPAWN_CHANCE.name: coldclimate_traders_spawn_chance
COLDCLIMATE_TRADERS_SPAWN_CHANCE.comment: Defines the spawnchance of a specific trader structure type. (default: 0.10)

TRADER_VILLAGES_SPAWN_CHANCE.name: trader_villages_spawn_chance
TRADER_VILLAGES_SPAWN_CHANCE.comment: Defines the spawnchance of a specific trader structure type. (default: 0.004)

BRICKLAYERS_SPAWN_CHANCE.name: bricklayers_spawn_chance
BRICKLAYERS_SPAWN_CHANCE.comment: Defines the spawnchance of bricklayers specific traders if that mod is loaded alongside bettertraders. (default: 0.03)

EXPANDEDFOODS_SPAWN_CHANCE.name: expandedfoods_spawn_chance
EXPANDEDFOODS_SPAWN_CHANCE.comment: Defines the spawnchance of expandedfoods specific traders if that mod is loaded alongside bettertraders. (default: 0.004)

BOOKTRADER_SPAWN_CHANCE.name: booktrader_spawn_chance
BOOKTRADER_SPAWN_CHANCE.comment: Defines the spawnchance of booktrader specific traders if that mod is loaded alongside bettertraders. (default: 0.03)

MINDISTANCE.name: mindistance
MINDISTANCE.comment: Defines the distance between traders and is messured in blocks. (default: 700)

formatting.title: Mindistance between traders
formatting.text:
!!! WARNING !!!
If you are using other mods that add traders be sure to have the mindistance set to the same value otherwise it will mess up and not result in correct spawnchances.
If you are just running bettertraders and the supported mods this is no problem.

formatting.title: Trader village formations
formatting.text:
!!! WARNING !!!
Does not respect mindistance!
Be careful with spawnchance changes :P.
